title: Picazzo's Organic Italian Kitchen
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Pizza, Italian, Organic, Juice bar, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Has many clearly marked vegan dishes including pasta, salads, pizza, veggie plates, and desserts. Uses Daiya cheese. Some of the other dishes can be made vegan. Uses 100% organic ingredients and some items are gluten free and others can be made gluten free. Has locations throughout Arizona.
